msg.welcome:
🎨 Welcome to Style Transfer Bot, {name}!

Transform your images with AI-powered enhancements:
• 🖌️ Style Transfer
• 👗 Object Editing
• ✏️ Text Modification
• 🌆 Background Swaps
• 🧑 Face Enhancement
• 📽 Image Animation

Send me a photo to get started!
msg.welcome_fallback: Welcome! Send me a photo to enhance it with AI.
msg.photo_received: 🎨 Great photo! What would you like to do with it?
msg.photo_upload_prompt: Send me a photo to start enhancing it with AI! 📸
msg.no_options: No options available for this category.
msg.processing: 🔄 Processing your image... This may take a moment!
msg.error_photo: Error processing photo. Please try again.
help.title: 🤖 *Style Transfer Bot Help*
help.how_to_use:
*How to use:*
1. Send me any photo
2. Choose enhancement type
3. Select specific style/effect
4. Wait for AI processing
help.features:
*Features:*
🎨 Style Transfer - Apply artistic styles
👗 Object Edit - Modify objects/clothing
✏️ Text Edit - Change text in images
🌆 Background Swap - Replace backgrounds
🧑 Face Enhancement - Improve portraits
📽 Animation - Bring images to life
help.premium_benefits:
*Premium Benefits:*
💎 Access to premium effects
🚀 Priority processing
✨ Higher quality results
🎬 Longer animations
premium.title: 💎 *Premium Subscription*
premium.features:
*Premium Features:*
✨ All style effects unlocked
🎬 Extended animations
🚀 Priority processing
🎨 Higher quality results
👑 Exclusive premium styles
premium.already_active:
✨ You already have Premium access!
Enjoy unlimited features and priority processing.
status.title: 👤 *User Status*
status.upgrade_note: 💡 Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access!
payment.invoice_description: Unlock all premium features for {duration} days!
payment.success_message:
🎉 Premium activated! Welcome to {plan_type} subscription.
Enjoy unlimited access to all features for {duration} days!
payment.activation_failed: ❌ Failed to activate premium. Please contact support.
payment.upgrade_prompt: 💎 Upgrade to Premium for unlimited access to all features!
